properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come my brothers
praise the Lord,
Alleluia.
Praise the Lord,
for he is God,
Alleluia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come to him
with songs of praise,
Alleluia.
Songs of praise
rejoice in him,
Alleluia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For the Lord
is almighty God,
Alleluia.
He is king
of all the world,
Alleluia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In his hands
are valleys deep,
Alleluia.
In his hands
are mountains peaks,
Alleluia.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
In his hands
are all the seas,
Alleluia.
And the lands
which he has made,
Alleluia.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come my brothers
praise the Lord,
Alleluia.
He is our God,
and we are his.
Alleluia.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Praise the Father,
praise the Son,
Alleluia.
Praise the Spirit,
the Holy one,
Alleluia.
